reviews.Comment:
The Vivo T3 Lite 5G is an entry-level 5G smartphone with a 6.56-inch LCD display and a 90Hz refresh rate for smooth visuals. Powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset with up to 6GB RAM, it offers decent performance for everyday use. The 50MP dual rear camera setup and 8MP front camera provide satisfactory photography. With a 5000mAh battery and fast charging support, it ensures long-lasting usage.
